_comment: State template for project-memory skill personalization tracking
_description: This file tracks the state of project interactions and personalization features
_initialized_description: Boolean indicating whether project-memory personalization has been initialized for this project
_version_description: Schema version for this state file format

personalization._comment: Tracks personalization features and user interaction states
personalization._waldo_greeted_description: Boolean flag indicating whether Waldo has greeted the user in this project (first-time setup)
personalization._plan_created_description: Boolean flag indicating whether a project plan has been created
personalization._plan_status_description: Current status of the project plan. Valid values: 'none' (no plan yet), 'planned' (plan created, not started), 'implementing' (actively working on plan tasks), 'complete' (plan completed)
personalization._plan_file_description: Relative path to the project plan document (relative to project root)
